description: Sports offer an important arena for the study of bodies and bodies in their various forms (e.g. bodies that do or govern sports) are also vital sites for studying sports. This module blends cultural and scientific perspectives to encourage diverse interests and multiple approaches toward sporting bodies. We will discuss a variety of issues including elite, college, and everyday sports and mental and physical health; sport industry and race, ethnicity, nation-state, and globalization; sports media, culture, and the embodiment of genders and sexualities; doping, substance (ab)use, and “sex-testing” in sport; disability, digital technologies, and sport inclusion and exclusion.
title: Sporting Bodies
